name: Playtown
description:
Playtown is a first person adventure horror game that takes place inside a kid's indoor playground. Play as a loving father that is tasked to find his daughter's missing necklace but beware - as danger can be lurking in every corner. Evade traps, solve mind-bending puzzles to your destination while trying to stay alive and explore the mysterious playground... but don't get caught.

Captivating story and puzzles to solve

Explore what was once a place filled with joy and experience the wonders of a emotional journey into finding your daughter's lost necklace inside a big indoor playground. A captivating adventure horror game that will tug at your heartstrings. Step into the shoes of a loving father determined to find and reunite his daughter with her precious necklace.

Mind-Bending Puzzles

Solve puzzles and try to stay alive in what once was once seen as an amusing attraction. The player is tasked with solving puzzles in order to get to their right destination with dangers lurking at every corner. Every step you will take can be a deadly, so make your choice wisely.. and don't loose your sanity.

The dinosaur-themed indoor park was once the dream place of every child!

The dinosaur-theme indoor playground was once the go-to place for every child to be filled with joy. Steg the dinosaur was everybody's favourite, however nobody knows what happens in the playground behind closed doors. Now you must explore the establishment and uncover some nasty secrets.

Explore pipe dreams, ball pits, and fun places to be around!

Be always cautious of any dangers that may lurk inside.

Challenging puzzles that will try to stop you from your goal.

Terrifying ambiance that can turn deadly at any step you'll take.

Remember, the floor is lava from your childhood? This one is deadlier.

Welcome to the kid's indoor playground place called - Playtown!

Find and uncover mysteries and puzzles to find out what happened in Playtown!

- but be careful, you are not alone ... Steg the dino might get you!



Experience the story and uncover the mysteries of what happened inside Playtown.

Playtown is a horror game made by one developer. This is an indie adventure horror game with puzzles to solve, and terrifying encounters, pickup system, running, saving system and more. If you can, please submit your feedback and report any bugs and this will really help speed up the progress of the development. Thanks!
